column5: The Cozy Loft is a tree house-type setting. This is a one bedroom efficiency space with a loft for a comfy queen mattress. One queen mattress, 1 comfy full futon and 1 cot (if requested). Full bath, mini kit, hot plate, coffee, micro, fridge and grill. You will love it here!! If you want to use the Popup on the drive for extra guests, the cost is $15 bucks per stay and $20 set up/take down fee.
column8: Cozy Loft near Gexa Energy Pavillion
